name: Robbie Hops Harvest
description:
Play as Robbie Hops, and help him gather crops from each season. Heads up, as some crops are hidden in certain areas. Can you gather them all?

Controls:

Left/Right keys: move Robbie

Z key: Jump

Shift: Glide while falling

Music by:

RoccoW: https://soundcloud.com/roccow

Pix: https://www.youtube.com/@Pixverses

Winter music by 8 Bit And Chill:
